label: relatedPolicy
comment: A compliance policy related to this sustainability assertion.

rangeIncludes.comment: A plan of action agreed or chosen in order to obey rules or requests made by people in authority and designed to prevent and detect violations of applicable law, regulations, rules and ethical standards by employees, agents and others.

domainIncludes.comment: A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
